comfort.title: Comfort and Quality
comfort.shortDescription: Spacious and comfortable rooms with all modern comforts for a relaxing stay.
comfort.expandedContent: Our rooms have been designed with your comfort in mind. Every detail is taken care of to offer you an unforgettable stay experience. From premium quality sheets to orthopedic pillows, everything is selected to ensure maximum relaxation. Individual air conditioning allows you to adjust the temperature according to your preferences, while the studied lighting creates the perfect atmosphere for every moment of the day.

location.title: Strategic Location
location.shortDescription: Located in a central position, easily accessible and close to main points of interest.
location.expandedContent: Our strategic location allows you to easily reach all the main points of interest in the city. Within a few minutes walk you will find typical restaurants, shops, museums and tourist attractions. Public transport is easily accessible, allowing you to explore the city in complete comfort. Furthermore, the area is well served and safe, ideal for evening walks and enjoying the local nightlife.

experience.title: Unique Experience
experience.shortDescription: A personalized stay experience that will make you feel at home.
experience.expandedContent: At Betta47 we don't just offer a place to sleep, but a complete experience. Our staff is always available to advise you on the best restaurants, attractions to visit and activities to do in the area. We also organize special events and themed dinners to introduce you to local culture and traditions. Our philosophy is to create a family environment where every guest feels special and welcome.

events.title: Events and Activities
events.shortDescription: We organize special events and activities to make your stay even more memorable.
events.expandedContent: During your stay you can participate in numerous events and activities organized by our staff. From themed dinners with typical local dishes to guided city tours, from wine tasting evenings to cultural activities, there's always something special to do. We also organize seasonal events such as neighborhood parties, craft markets and musical shows. All events are included in the stay price and represent a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in local culture.
